column4: Hello, I am having issues configuring my printer connected to my ubuntu 10.04 via usb to be able to print to the printer from a windows computer, Can anyone help please?
Tarzeau-ppc It does have network, But in this configureation  I would pefer to use usb
I would like to use samba, as I just have it installed, But I need help configuring it, I cant get the windows computer to reconize it on the network
did you share some folders in nautilus??
